price: Kwa tone la manii, akamuumba na akamkadiria.
footnotes: Kutokana na maji ya kudharauliwa Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu alimwanzisha kumuumba akamjaalia apitie daraja mbali mbali za kukua.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
